Readme

PowerSystemsUnits

A supplemental power systems units package for Unitful 0.1.0 or later.

Usage

Modules that use PowerSystemsUnits will typically have to explicitly register PowerSystemsUnits with Unitful because precompilation is not currently supported:

using Unitful
using PowerSystemsUnits

Unitful.register(PowerSystemsUnits)
